text: wmn hwla' almushrikin man yastamie 'iilayk alquran -ayha alrswl-, fala yasil 'iilaa qlwbhm; li'anahum bsbb atbaehm 'ahwa'ahum jaealna ealaa qulubuhum aghtyt; lialaa yafqahuu alqran, wajaealna fi adhanihim thqla wsmmana fala tasmae wala tey shyyana, wa'iin yarawa alayat alkathirat aldalt ealaa sidq muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam la yasadaquu bha, hataa 'iidha jawwk -ayha alrswl- baed meaynt alayat aldalt ealaa sdqk ykhasmwnk: yaqul aladhin jahaduu ayat allh: ma hdha aldhy nasmae 'iilaa ma tnaqlh al'awalun min hkayat la hqyqt lha
